trait.name: Brave
entries: Orister has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleless
entries: Orister can move through a space of a Medium or larger creature.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: When Orister rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: Orister can attempt to hide when he is obscured by a Medium or bigger creature.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Invoke Duplicity (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Orister creates an illusory duplicate of himself that lasts for 1 minute, or until he loses {@status concentration} (as if he was {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell). The illusion appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Orister. As a bonus action, Orister can move the illusion up to 30 feet to a space he can see, but it must remain within 120 feet of him.

For the duration, Orister can cast spells as though he was in the illusion's space, and when both Orister and his illusion are within 5 feet of a creature, he has advantage on attack rolls against that creature.

action.name: Cloak of Shadows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Orister becomes {@condition invisible} until the end of his next turn. He become visible if he attacks or casts a spell.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
